docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: 主页

docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org .
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: 查询已被授权人员 url:/tools/authorizedUser/ 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "核心网运行部": [ { "华为数据组": [ "zz", "sunbo222" ] }, { "诺基亚组": [ "sunbo" ] } ], "监控部": [ { "C&M小组": [ "lll" ] } ] }, "msg": "查询成功" } 查询已被授权人员列表 url:/tools/authorizedUser/list 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 查询未授权人员 url:/tools/unauthorizedUser/ 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "核心网运行部": [ { "诺基亚组": [ "sunbo" ] } ], "监控部": [ { "C&M小组": [ "lll" ] } ] }, "msg": "查询成功" } 为工具添加权限 url:/tools/authority/ 方法:POST 添加权限 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 必填 group_name: 组id 【多个组以';'号隔开】 user_name: 组id 【多个组以';'号隔开】 group_name和user_name二者选填其一 方法: DELETE 删除权限 用法同上
docs.title: 权限

docs.text: url:/tools/authorizedUser/ 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "核心网运行部": [ { "华为数据组": [ "zz", "sunbo222" ] }, { "诺基亚组": [ "sunbo" ] } ], "监控部": [ { "C&M小组": [ "lll" ] } ] }, "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 查询已被授权人员

docs.text: url:/tools/authorizedUser/list 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id
docs.title: 查询已被授权人员列表

docs.text: url:/tools/unauthorizedUser/ 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "核心网运行部": [ { "诺基亚组": [ "sunbo" ] } ], "监控部": [ { "C&M小组": [ "lll" ] } ] }, "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 查询未授权人员

docs.text: url:/tools/authority/ 方法:POST 添加权限 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 必填 group_name: 组id 【多个组以';'号隔开】 user_name: 组id 【多个组以';'号隔开】 group_name和user_name二者选填其一 方法: DELETE 删除权限 用法同上
docs.title: 为工具添加权限

docs.text: 通讯录接口 url:/confapp/contact/ 方法:get 发起会议 url:/confapp/create_conf/ 方法:post 参数： attendee:与会人，[{"num": "15268117291"，"name": "孙博",}] theme: 会议主题 password:密码 主席位: 格式同与会人 type: 1 立即会议 2 预约会议 time: 预约会议开始时间 我的会议 url:/confapp/myconf/ 方法:get
docs.title: 小程序

docs.text: url:/confapp/contact/ 方法:get
docs.title: 通讯录接口

docs.text: url:/confapp/create_conf/ 方法:post 参数： attendee:与会人，[{"num": "15268117291"，"name": "孙博",}] theme: 会议主题 password:密码 主席位: 格式同与会人 type: 1 立即会议 2 预约会议 time: 预约会议开始时间
docs.title: 发起会议

docs.text: url:/confapp/myconf/ 方法:get
docs.title: 我的会议

docs.text:
上传文件参数 url:/schedule/config/ 方法:POST 请求参数: 文件:file 工具id:tool_id 返回uuid 如果用户上传了文件参数，调用运行接口是带着uuid { "status": 1, "data": { "uuid": "3667b61228737d861f961f706d68ba12" }, "msg": "上传成功" } 运行日志 url:/schedule/log/ 方法:GET 请求参数: 查询参数:search_params 模糊查询工具和运行人 选传 开始时间:start_time 选传 结束时间:end_time 宣传(默认请求时间) 每页数据个数：page_size 当前页：current_page 不填 默认 6和1 { "status": 1, "data": { "count": 12, "num_pages": 2, "info": [ { "username": "sunbo", "run_time": "2019-12-26T14:15:14.781", "tname": "yidong", "status": "SUCCESS", "id": 1, "task_id": "86bc60d6-3f73-4381-97e6-b474305432f5", "result": "{"data": [{"type": "table", "title": "\用\户\信\息\表", "columns": ["\名\称", "\值"], "rows": [["SUBID", "+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com"], ["CAP", "[201,301]"], ["IMPI", "+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com"], ["IMPU", "[sip:+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com,tel:+8657156150671]"], ["VNT", "1"], ["Sifc", "[91]"]]}, {"type": "Histogram", "title": "\用\户\信\息\图", "columns": ["\日\期", "\成\本", "\利\润"], "rows": [["1\月", "1523", "1234"], ["2\月", "1523", "1234"], ["3\月", "1523", "1234"]]}]}" }, { "username": "sunbo", "run_time": "2019-12-26T14:16:19.463", "tname": "yidong", "status": "SUCCESS", "id": 2, "task_id": "065f03f5-e70c-4432-9845-d7cb9cdffb1c", "result": "{"data": [{"type": "table", "title": "\用\户\信\息\表", "columns": ["\名\称", "\值"], "rows": [["SUBID", "+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com"], ["CAP", "[201,301]"], ["IMPI", "+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com"], ["IMPU", "[sip:+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com,tel:+8657156150671]"], ["VNT", "1"], ["Sifc", "[91]"]]}, {"type": "Histogram", "title": "\用\户\信\息\图", "columns": ["\日\期", "\成\本", "\利\润"], "rows": [["1\月", "1523", "1234"], ["2\月", "1523", "1234"], ["3\月", "1523", "1234"]]}]}" }, { "username": "sunbo", "run_time": "2019-12-26T14:16:30.406", "tname": "yidong", "status": "SUCCESS", "id": 3, "task_id": "379716d1-5abf-484a-a524-8f8c91d518b4", "result": "{"data": [{"type": "table", "title": "\用\户\信\息\表", "columns": ["\名\称", "\值"], "rows": [["SUBID", "+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com"], ["CAP", "[201,301]"], ["IMPI", "+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com"], ["IMPU", "[sip:+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com,tel:+8657156150671]"], ["VNT", "1"], ["Sifc", "[91]"]]}, {"type": "Histogram", "title": "\用\户\信\息\图", "columns": ["\日\期", "\成\本", "\利\润"], "rows": [["1\月", "1523", "1234"], ["2\月", "1523", "1234"], ["3\月", "1523", "1234"]]}]}" }, { "username": "sunbo", "run_time": "2019-12-26T14:16:58.263", "tname": "yidong", "status": "SUCCESS", "id": 4, "task_id": "617f85f3-477f-4831-b092-c918f64bafa4", "result": "{"data": [{"type": "table", "title": "\用\户\信\息\表", "columns": ["\名\称", "\值"], "rows": [["SUBID", "+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com"], ["CAP", "[201,301]"], ["IMPI", "+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com"], ["IMPU", "[sip:+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com,tel:+8657156150671]"], ["VNT", "1"], ["Sifc", "[91]"]]}, {"type": "Histogram", "title": "\用\户\信\息\图", "columns": ["\日\期", "\成\本", "\利\润"], "rows": [["1\月", "1523", "1234"], ["2\月", "1523", "1234"], ["3\月", "1523", "1234"]]}]}" }, { "username": "sunbo", "run_time": "2019-12-26T14:17:21.092", "tname": "yidong", "status": "SUCCESS", "id": 5, "task_id": "c8903b5e-7df6-4e73-b023-478dc99d3894", "result": "{"data": [{"type": "table", "title": "\用\户\信\息\表", "columns": ["\名\称", "\值"], "rows": [["SUBID", "+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com"], ["CAP", "[201,301]"], ["IMPI", "+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com"], ["IMPU", "[sip:+8657156150671@ims.zj.chinamobile.com,tel:+8657156150671]"], ["VNT", "1"], ["Sifc", "[91]"]]}, {"type": "Histogram", "title": "\用\户\信\息\图", "columns": ["\日\期", "\成\本", "\利\润"], "rows": [["1\月", "1523", "1234"], ["2\月", "1523", "1234"], ["3\月", "1523", "1234"]]}]}" }, { "username": "sunbo", "run_time": "2019-12-26T14:48:35.057", "tname": "gongju3", "status": "FAILURE", "id": 30, "task_id": "e37f6311-6801-42c4-9815-809f0871af69", "result": "Traceback (most recent call last):
 File "/Users/sunbo/Desktop/sunbo/yidong/sre-udp/celery_tasks/tasks.py", line 32, in run_script
 rl.sace()
AttributeError: 'RunLog' object has no attribute 'sace'
" } ] }, "msg": "查询成功" } 最近使用 url:/schedule/recent/ 方法:GET 请求参数:无 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "tool_id": 2, "tool_name": "工具1" }, { "tool_id": 16, "tool_name": "工具55555" } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 历史工具使用曲线 url:/schedule/number/history/ 方法:GET 请求参数: search_info: 查询参数 year 查询最近十二个月的历史数据 month 查询最近30天的历史数据 day 查询最近7天历史数据 不填默认最近7天数据 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "day": "2019-12-06", "number": 6 }, { "day": "2019-12-07", "numbers": 0 }, { "day": "2019-12-08", "numbers": 0 }, { "day": "2019-12-09", "number": 171 }, { "day": "2019-12-10", "number": 60 }, { "day": "2019-12-11", "numbers": 0 }, { "day": "2019-12-12", "numbers": 0 }, { "day": "2019-12-13", "numbers": 0 } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 工具使用排名 url:/schedule/rank/ 方法:GET 请求参数: order_way: 排序方式 1 ： 正序 -1 倒序 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "tool_name": "工具55555", "total": 14 }, { "tool_name": "工具1", "total": 33 }, { "tool_name": "gongju3", "total": 188 } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 总使用次数 url:/schedule/number/ 参数: 无 方法:GET total_numbers: 总次数 today_numbers: 今日新增次数 { "status": 1, "data": { "total_numbers": 603, "today_numbers": 0 }, "msg": "查询成功" } 运行 url:/schedule/run/ 方法:POST 请求参数: id: 工具id params: 参数 字典格式{} uuid: 文件参数信息 选传 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 17, "task_id": "f10e336c-bbb9-4643-9a18-2fdf29fc9a3f", "task_name": "21574384240", "status": "PENDING", "result": "", "create_time": "2019-11-22T00:57:20.850Z" }, "msg": "调用成功" } 查询运行状态 url:/schedule/run/ 方法:GET 请求参数: id: 任务id { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 17, "task_id": "f10e336c-bbb9-4643-9a18-2fdf29fc9a3f", "task_name": "21574384240", "status": "SUCCESS", "result": "this is a test", "create_time": "2019-11-22T00:57:20.850Z" }, "msg": "查询成功" } PENDING = 'PENDING': 任务准备中 STARTED = 'STARTED': 任务开始 SUCCESS = 'SUCCESS': 任务成功 RUNNING = 'RUNNING': 任务运行中 FAILURE = 'FAILURE': 任务失败
docs.title: 调度

docs.text: url:/schedule/config/ 方法:POST 请求参数: 文件:file 工具id:tool_id 返回uuid 如果用户上传了文件参数，调用运行接口是带着uuid { "status": 1, "data": { "uuid": "3667b61228737d861f961f706d68ba12" }, "msg": "上传成功" }
docs.title: 上传文件参数

docs.text: url:/schedule/recent/ 方法:GET 请求参数:无 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "tool_id": 2, "tool_name": "工具1" }, { "tool_id": 16, "tool_name": "工具55555" } ], "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 最近使用

docs.text: url:/schedule/number/history/ 方法:GET 请求参数: search_info: 查询参数 year 查询最近十二个月的历史数据 month 查询最近30天的历史数据 day 查询最近7天历史数据 不填默认最近7天数据 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "day": "2019-12-06", "number": 6 }, { "day": "2019-12-07", "numbers": 0 }, { "day": "2019-12-08", "numbers": 0 }, { "day": "2019-12-09", "number": 171 }, { "day": "2019-12-10", "number": 60 }, { "day": "2019-12-11", "numbers": 0 }, { "day": "2019-12-12", "numbers": 0 }, { "day": "2019-12-13", "numbers": 0 } ], "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 历史工具使用曲线

docs.text: url:/schedule/rank/ 方法:GET 请求参数: order_way: 排序方式 1 ： 正序 -1 倒序 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "tool_name": "工具55555", "total": 14 }, { "tool_name": "工具1", "total": 33 }, { "tool_name": "gongju3", "total": 188 } ], "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 工具使用排名

docs.text: url:/schedule/number/ 参数: 无 方法:GET total_numbers: 总次数 today_numbers: 今日新增次数 { "status": 1, "data": { "total_numbers": 603, "today_numbers": 0 }, "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 总使用次数

docs.text: url:/schedule/run/ 方法:POST 请求参数: id: 工具id params: 参数 字典格式{} uuid: 文件参数信息 选传 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 17, "task_id": "f10e336c-bbb9-4643-9a18-2fdf29fc9a3f", "task_name": "21574384240", "status": "PENDING", "result": "", "create_time": "2019-11-22T00:57:20.850Z" }, "msg": "调用成功" }
docs.title: 运行

docs.text: url:/schedule/run/ 方法:GET 请求参数: id: 任务id { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 17, "task_id": "f10e336c-bbb9-4643-9a18-2fdf29fc9a3f", "task_name": "21574384240", "status": "SUCCESS", "result": "this is a test", "create_time": "2019-11-22T00:57:20.850Z" }, "msg": "查询成功" } PENDING = 'PENDING': 任务准备中 STARTED = 'STARTED': 任务开始 SUCCESS = 'SUCCESS': 任务成功 RUNNING = 'RUNNING': 任务运行中 FAILURE = 'FAILURE': 任务失败
docs.title: 查询运行状态

docs.text: 1.工具上传 1.POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/tools/ header Content-Type ：multipart/form-data body username：用户名 tname ： 文件名 myfile ： 文件 main_file 入口文件 main_method 入口方法 params ： 参数 describe ： 描述 2.工具删除 1.Delete http://127.0.0.1:8000/tools/？tname=工具名 params：tname ： 工具名 3.个人工具查询 1.GET http://127.0.0.1:8000/tools/ return： '工具序号': id, '工具名': tname, '工具上传时间': tup_date, '工具更新时间':update_time '运行次数':run_count 4.条件工具查询 1.POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/tools/toolsquery/ return： '工具序号': id, '工具名': tname, '工具上传时间': tup_date, '工具入口文件地址': main_file, '工具入口方法': main_method, '工具参数':params, '工具描述':describe '工具更新时间':update_time '运行次数':run_count 5.工具调用 GET http://127.0.0.1:8000/tools/toolsuse/?id=2 params id：XX return： '工具序号': id, '工具名': tname, '工具上传时间': tup_date, '工具入口文件地址': main_file, '工具入口方法': main_method, '工具参数': params, '工具描述': describe 6.工具占比数量 GET http://127.0.0.1:8000/tools/toolspercent/ 7.用户上传排名 POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/tools/toolspercent/ order_way 1正序 -1倒序 8.工具总数 GET http://127.0.0.1:8000/tools/toolstotal/ 9.工具编辑查询 GET http://127.0.0.1:8000/tools/toolsEditor/?id=2 return '工具序号': id, '工具名':tname, '工具上传时间':tup_date, '工具入口文件地址':main_file, '工具入口方法': main_method, '工具参数':params, '工具描述':describe '工具最近更新时间':update_time '上传文件的窗口显示内容':upload_file 10.工具编辑修改 POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/tools/toolsEditor/ 传给我的参数 id:"工具id" username:"当前用户的用户名" tname:"文件名" main_file:"入口文件" main_method:"入口方法" params:"参数" describe:"工具描述" myfile:"上传的工具压缩包"
docs.title: 工具

docs.text: Content-Type ：multipart/form-data

docs.text: id:"工具id" username:"当前用户的用户名" tname:"文件名" main_file:"入口文件" main_method:"入口方法" params:"参数" describe:"工具描述" myfile:"上传的工具压缩包"
docs.title: 传给我的参数

docs.text: 密码修改 url: /users/changepwd/ 方法：POST 参数: 旧密码:old_password 新密码:new_password 需要修改的账号:username { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 4, "username": "zz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "EPC组", "depart": "移动互联网", "is_active": true }, "msg": "编辑成功" } 工具收藏 url: users/collections/ 方法：POST 参数: 工具id：tool_id { "status": 1, "data": { "username": "sunbo", "toolname": "工具55555" }, "msg": "收藏成功" } 收藏工具查询 url: users/collections/ 方法：GET 每页数据个数：page_size 当前页：current_page 不填 默认 6和1 工具id: tool_id 如果有工具id参数 会返回该工具是否被收藏，没有返回分页收藏列表 { "status": 1, "data": true, "msg": "工具已在收藏列表中" } { "status": 1, "data": { "info": [ { "tool_id": 6, "tool_name": "gongju", "tup_date": "2019-11-22", "tuser": "zzz", "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部", "authoried_name": [ "zzz" ] }, { "tool_id": 15, "tool_name": "gongju3", "tup_date": "2019-11-28", "tuser": "zz", "group": "EPC组", "depart": "移动互联网", "authoried_name": [ "sunbo", "用户1", "yidong", "zz", "zzz", "测试1", "测试2" ] } ], "count": 3, "num_pages": 2 }, "msg": "查询成功" } count: 总条数 num_pages: 总页数 取消工具收藏 url: users/collections/ 方法： DELETE 参数: 工具id: tool_id 实时用户数 url: users/number/ 方法：GET { "status": 1, "data": { "total": 14, "new": 0 }, "msg": "查询成功" } total: 总数量 new: 今日新增数量 查询用户信息 url: users/userInfo/ 方法：GET 参数: 用户id：id 返回示例： is_active: 账号是否激活，False表示账号被停用 role: 账号角色；1管理员，2用户，3游客 username: 用户名 group: 组 depart: 部门 id: id phone: 手机号 { "status": 1, "data": { "id": id, "username": "sunbo", "phone": "15268117291", "is_active": true, "role": 管理员, "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部" }, "msg": "查询成功" } 编辑账号信息 url: users/userInfo/ 方法：PUT 参数: id: 被修改账号的id username:被修改账号的用户名 password:被修改账号的密码 phone:被修改账号的手机号 group_id:被修改账号的组id role:被修改账号的角色（1，2，3） 1, 管理员 2, 用户 3, 游客 删除账号 url: users/userInfo/ 方法：DELETE 参数: 用户：id 需要删除的账号id 获取csrf_token url:/users/csrftoken/ 方法:GET 登录 url:/users/login/ 方法:POST 请求参数: 用户名：username 密码：password 返回信息示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 1, "username": "sunbo", "session_id": "44ohfud9s6kkjfo3m5a3olr42mu5w2pp"， "phone": "8888888", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "role": "用户" }, "msg": "登录成功" } 退出登录 url:/users/loginout/ 方法:GET 请求参数: 无 查询所有启用账号信息 url: users/active/ 方法: GET 参数: is_active: 1代表启用账号 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 1, "username": "sunbo", "phone": "15268117291", "role": "用户", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "is_active": true }, { "id": 2, "username": "sunbo2", "phone": "test", "role": "管理员", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "is_active": true }, { "id": 4, "username": "zz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部", "is_active": true }, { "id": 5, "username": "zzz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部", "is_active": true }, { "id": 6, "username": "zzzzzzz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "chatops小组", "depart": "监控部", "is_active": true } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 查询所有停用账号信息 url: users/active/ 方法: GET 参数: is_active: 0代表停用账号 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 3, "username": "sunbo3", "phone": "test", "role": "管理员", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "is_active": false } ], "msg": "查询停用状态账号成功" } 启用账号 url: users/active/ 方法: POST 参数: id: 被修改账号id is_active: 1代表启用账号 停用账号 url: users/active/ 方法: POST 参数: id: 被修改账号id is_active: 0代表停用账号 修改角色 url: users/role/ 方法: POST 参数: id:用户名 role:状态 1 管理员 2 用户 3 游客 用户注册 url:/users/register/ 方法:POST 请求参数: username:注册账号用户名 password:注册账号密码 role:注册账号密码角色 group:注册账号组名 phone:注册账号手机号 返回信息示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "username": "sunbo3", "phone": "test", "role": "1" }, "msg": "注册成功" } 账号管理首页模糊查询 url: users/serInfo/contain/ 方法: GET 参数: name: 输入的查询信息 用户列表 url: users/all/ 方法: GET 参数: 用户：username { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 1, "role": "管理员", "username": "sunbo", "status": true, "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部" }, { "id": 2, "role": "管理员", "username": "sunbo2", "status": true, "group": "test", "depart": "test" }, { "id": 3, "role": "管理员", "username": "sunbo3", "status": true, "group": "test", "depart": "test" }, { "id": 4, "role": "管理员", "username": "zz", "status": true, "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部" } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 添加部门 url: users/department 方法: POST 参数: 部门名: name 示例 { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 6, "name": "test" }, "msg": "添加成功" } id 部门id name 部门名字 添加组 url: users/group 方法: POST 参数: 组名: group_name 部门id: depart_id 示例 { "status": 1, "data": { "group_name": "test", "depart_id": "6", "id": 8 }, "msg": "添加成功" } 查询所有部门 url: users/departments/ 方法: GET 示例 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 2, "group_name": "核心网运行部" }, { "id": 3, "group_name": "监控部" }, { "id": 4, "group_name": "业务系统运行部" }, { "id": 5, "group_name": "移动互联网" }, { "id": 6, "group_name": "test" } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 查询部门下所有组 url: users/department/groups/ 方法: GET 参数: 部门: depart_name 示例 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 2, "group_name": "华为数据组" }, { "id": 3, "group_name": "诺基亚组" } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 查询组下所有工具 url: users/group/tools/ 方法: GET 参数: 组名: group_name 查询组下所有成员 url: users/group/users/ 方法: GET 参数: 组名: group_name 首页部门组合工具信息接口 url: users/detailInfo/ 方法: GET 参数:无 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "name": "核心网运行部", "key": "front_one", "id": 2, "children": [ { "name": "华为数据组", "key": "front_two", "id": 2, "children": [] }, { "name": "诺基亚组", "key": "front_two", "id": 3, "children": [] } ] }, { "name": "监控部", "key": "front_one", "id": 3, "children": [ { "name": "chatops小组", "key": "front_two", "id": 4, "children": [] }, { "name": "C&M小组", "key": "front_two", "id": 5, "children": [] } ] }, { "name": "业务系统运行部", "key": "front_one", "id": 4, "children": [] }, { "name": "移动互联网", "key": "front_one", "id": 5, "children": [ { "name": "EPC组", "key": "front_two", "id": 6, "children": [] }, { "name": "大IP组", "key": "front_two", "id": 7, "children": [] } ] }, { "name": "test", "key": "front_one", "id": 6, "children": [ { "name": "test", "key": "front_two", "id": 8, "children": [] }, { "name": "test2", "key": "front_two", "id": 9, "children": [] } ] } ], "msg": "请求成功" }
docs.title: 用户

docs.text: url: /users/changepwd/ 方法：POST 参数: 旧密码:old_password 新密码:new_password 需要修改的账号:username { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 4, "username": "zz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "EPC组", "depart": "移动互联网", "is_active": true }, "msg": "编辑成功" }
docs.title: 密码修改

docs.text: url: users/collections/ 方法：POST 参数: 工具id：tool_id { "status": 1, "data": { "username": "sunbo", "toolname": "工具55555" }, "msg": "收藏成功" }
docs.title: 工具收藏

docs.text: url: users/collections/ 方法：GET 每页数据个数：page_size 当前页：current_page 不填 默认 6和1 工具id: tool_id 如果有工具id参数 会返回该工具是否被收藏，没有返回分页收藏列表 { "status": 1, "data": true, "msg": "工具已在收藏列表中" } { "status": 1, "data": { "info": [ { "tool_id": 6, "tool_name": "gongju", "tup_date": "2019-11-22", "tuser": "zzz", "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部", "authoried_name": [ "zzz" ] }, { "tool_id": 15, "tool_name": "gongju3", "tup_date": "2019-11-28", "tuser": "zz", "group": "EPC组", "depart": "移动互联网", "authoried_name": [ "sunbo", "用户1", "yidong", "zz", "zzz", "测试1", "测试2" ] } ], "count": 3, "num_pages": 2 }, "msg": "查询成功" } count: 总条数 num_pages: 总页数
